metadata.title: CVE-2021-28210 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An unlimited recursion in DxeCore in EDK II.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-28210` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 2020.11-4
ovmf-ia32 - 2020.11-4
qemu-efi - 2020.11-4
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 2020.11-4
qemu-efi-arm - 2020.11-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2020.11-4').
